hints.content:
$\blueD{85}$ is the smallest whole number that rounds to $90$.

[[☃ image 1]]

options.alt: A number line labeled 80 to 100 with tick marks at every 1 unit. The tick marks at 80, 85, 90, and 100 are labeled. The tick mark for 85 is blue. !

hints.content:
$\blueD{94}$ is the greatest whole number that rounds to $90$.
[[☃ image 1]]

So, any whole number from $\blueD{85}$ to $\blueD{94}$ rounds to $90$.

options.alt: A number line labeled 80 to 100 with tick marks at every 1 unit. The tick marks at 80, 85, 90, 94, and 100 are labeled. The tick marks for 85 and 94 are blue. !

A number line labeled 80 to 100 with tick marks at every 1 unit. The tick marks at 80, 85, 90, 94, and 100 are labeled. The tick marks for 85 and 94 are blue. A blue line runs along the number line from the tick mark at 85 to the tick mark at 94. !

question.content:
**Which number line highlights all whole numbers that round to $90$ if we are rounding to the nearest ten?**

[[☃ radio 1]]

choices.content: ![A number line labeled 80 to 100 with tick marks at every 1 unit. The tick marks at 80, 85, 90, 95, and 100 are labeled. The tick marks for 85 and 95 are blue. A blue line runs along the number line from the tick mark at 85 to the tick mark at 95.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/48e0029fca02a5910d9ca94ee6b767410a3b06c5)

![A number line labeled 80 to 100 with tick marks at every 1 unit. The tick marks at 80, 90, 95, and 100 are labeled. The tick marks for 90 and 95 are blue. A blue line runs along the number line from the tick mark at 90 to the tick mark at 95.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/e32936164115e9743e90973638a888e7c6932c40)

![A number line labeled 80 to 100 with tick marks at every 1 unit. The tick marks at 80, 85, 90, 94, and 100 are labeled. The tick marks for 85 and 94 are blue. A blue line runs along the number line from the tick mark at 85 to the tick mark at 94.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/e987ef67bd343cd5d538696695ea8339dcb19f07)
